of row 11 single_crochet break yarn and pull tail through last st fastening off weave in ends dorsal fin leaving a 10-12 tail for sewing chain 8 row 1 beginning in the 2nd chain from hook 7 turn 3 single_crochet row 7 decrease single_crochet chain 1 turn 2 single_crochet row 8 decrease break yarn and pull tail through last st fastening off *whipstitch row 1 of dorsal fin to body along the fish s back at patterned section fold the top point down to meet one of the bottom corners of the fin and stitch to body again along first line of whipstitches pelvic fin leaving a 10-12 tail for sewing chain 6 row 1 beginning in the 2nd chain from hook 5 single_crochet chain 1 turn row 2 single_crochet in each st to end of row chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet row 3 decrease single_crochet and pull tail through last st fastening off *whipstitch row 1 of pelvic fin to body along the fish s stomach at patterned section lining it up with the dorsal fin fold the top point down to meet one of the bottom corners of the fin and stitch to body again along first line of whipstitches pectoral fins make 2 leaving a 10-12 tail for sewing chain 3 row 1 beginning in the 2nd chain from hook 2
